main event: A white disc, shaped like a quarter, was observed hovering and moving over Kelly AFB, Texas on 2 September 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as having a bright white light that fluctuated from five or six points from bright to dull over seven minutes., The sighting lasted for approximately 20-25 minutes., One observer noted that the object disappeared rapidly behind buildings and trees., Conditions were recorded as night with bright visibility., Astronomical analysis suggested it could have been Venus at the time.
sighted object: white disc flying over Kelly AFB
witness description: Personnel Clerk and Airman, both stationed at Kelly AFB
